Title: The Sea King
Writer: Michael Connelly (based on the novels by), Michael Connelly (written for television by), Eric Ellis Overmyer (developed for television by), Daniel Pyne (written for television by)
Actors: Titus Welliver, Jamie Hector, Amy Aquino, Madison Lintz
Plot: Bosch's relentless pursuit in the Meadows case reaches a climax. Bosch and Edgar talk about a startling discovery. An unexpected visitor drops in on Bosch and Maddie. Harry learns that his history is far from settled.
